nodes.text: You've Never Heard of the Millennium Falcon?

You've Never Heard of the Millennium Falcon? is an interactive young-readers book that adapts portions of the film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope involving Han Solo and the starship Millennium Falcon. The book includes interactive audio with four sound clips from Han Solo. It was published by Phoenix International Publications, Inc. on September 1, 2016, as part of the Play-a-Sound series.
